main – Main package¶

heuristic.stops_longitude_latitude_too_close¶

class heuristic.stops_longitude_latitude_too_close.StopsLongitudeLatitudeTooClose¶

Bases: object

LATITUDE_DEGREE_IN_METER = 111319.5¶
execute(stop_1, stop_2, min_distance_meter=5.0)¶

Verifies if two stop are too close by comparing latitude and longitude. :param stop_1: First stop to compare. :param stop_2: Second stop to compare. :param min_distance_meter: Minimum distance threshold in meter. Default at 5m. :returns: boolean. True if the two stops are closer than the min_distance_meter, false otherwise.
